body:
I was using older version of `spack`. For some testing switched to `v0.10.0` and got :

```
$ spack install -j1 --keep-stage -v tau
==> Error: YAML ProviderIndex was not a dict.

$ spack spec tau
Input spec
--------------------------------
tau

Normalized
--------------------------------
tau
    ^pdt

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: YAML ProviderIndex was not a dict.
```

Doing `rm -rf ~/.spack/cache` solved the problem.

Would it be possible to improve the error message (to get some hint) ?
title: Error message : "Error: YAML ProviderIndex was not a dict"
